meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>threaten</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to threaten</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: I'm going <vocabulary>to threaten</vocabulary> you with your life if you have a bad <reading>odo</reading>r (おど). Imagine someone with a bad odor, then threaten them.
